AzureBlade got annoyed.

AzureBlade: Come on, Windlord, can't you see he doesn't get it? He 
was programmed after one of these stupid prehistoric humans, for 
Primus's sake!

Rodimus was surprised at Azure reaction, but said nothing to reveal 
so.

Rodimus: Azure's got a point there. Early humans have next to no 
comprehension of their own anatomy. If Denzabar here was programmed 
to think he's human, there's little hope that he understands why he's 
different, and even less to make him understand now and here who he 
is. However, if he can act as our representative to the human clans 
of the region, that would help us. 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> The Caveman stared with a dazed look on his face. He had no idea 
what he was 
> talking about.
